original_text: Then Joshua read the whole Law aloud to them. He read the blessings and the curses, as they are written on the scroll of the Law.
korean_text: 그 후에 여호수아가 율법책에 기록된 모든 것 대로 축복과 저주하는 율법의 모든 말씀을 낭독하였으니

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua read the whole Law aloud to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호수아가 그들에게 온 율법을 소리 내어 읽었다

sentences.original_text: He read the blessings and the curses
as they are written on the scroll of the Law
